forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 52F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
